name: Suspect Enemy
description:
Description

Our planet is on the brink of destruction, and in order to survive, we need to colonize another planet... You are 1 in volunteers to colonize another planet but be careful! There is a killer among you who must be found and kicked before the whole crew is killed.

Crew

  • To win, you need to complete all tasks or kicked all killers in the vote.
  • Urgently repair sabotage, if you do not have time then you will lose.
  • Keep track of other crew members using cameras or the admin panel.
  • Monitor the condition of the crew with a medical sensor.
  • Report any corpses found or suspicious activity of other players.
  • Vote to banish the killer.

Killer

  • Kill crew members and frame other players by giving false information or accusing them of murder.
  • Pretend to complete tasks so as not to arouse suspicion.
  • Use teleports carefully to quickly change your location.
  • Use sabotage to make it easier to kill or force the crew to move around the map.
  • Close doors to hide or stop a crew.

Features

  • In-game voice and text chat.
  • Color randomization.
  • Full game customization: More killers, more tasks and so much more.
